bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": ""
};
var requestBody = `{}`;
var option = {
    "method": "POST",
    "body": String(requestBody),
    "headers": ""
};
var Url1 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ListRank?device=pc&platform=web,' + JSON.stringify(option);
var Url2 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/AllLabel?device=pc&platform=web,' + JSON.stringify(option);
rank = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url1)).data.list;
kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url2)).data.styles;
var exploreUrl = [];
if(cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('SESSDATA')) {
    var list = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/nav')).data;
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('SESSDATA') && !list.uname) {
    	Login();
    	list = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/nav')).data;
    }
    if(list.uname) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), list.uname);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), list.uname);
        Option9 = `{{get('option9','0')}}`;
        Option10 = `{{get('option10','0')}}`;
        Option11 = `{{get('option11','0')}}`;
        Option12 = `{{get('option12','0')}}`;
        Option13 = `{{get('option13','0')}}`;
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + list.uname + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("bili-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('已购漫画', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/user.v1.User/GetAutoBuyComics?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option10}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读历史', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListHistory?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option10}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣  追　漫  ✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('追漫顺序', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option11}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('更新时间', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option12}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('完成等免', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option13}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Option = `{{get('option','0')}}`;
Option1 = `{{get('option1','0')}}`;
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/GetRankInfo?device=pc&platform=web,${Option}${rank[i].id}${Option1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i].name, url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Option2 = `{{get('option2','0')}}`;
Option3 = `{{get('option3','0')}}`;
Option4 = `{{get('option4','0')}}`;
Option5 = `{{get('option5','0')}}`;
Option6 = `{{get('option6','0')}}`;
Option7 = `{{get('option7','0')}}`;
Option8 = `{{get('option8','0')}}`;
O = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
url0 = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ClassPage?device=pc&platform=web,${Option2}-1${Option3}${O}${Option4}${P}${Option5}${R}${Option6}{{page}}${Option7}${Q}${Option8}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部', url0, 1, 0.25, false));
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ClassPage?device=pc&platform=web,${Option2}${kind[j].id}${Option3}${O}${Option4}${P}${Option5}${R}${Option6}{{page}}${Option7}${Q}${Option8}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j].name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = ((kind.length + 1) % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - ((kind.length + 1) % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
let ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url')); var ComicId = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('ComicId' + book.bookUrl)); var Epid = String(baseUrl).replace(/.*ep_id\"\:(\d+)\}.*/, '$1'); if(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('SESSDATA')) { let option = '{"body":{"comic_id":' + ComicId + ',"ep_id":' + Epid + '},"headers":"","method": "POST"}'; let hurl = Get('url') + '/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/AddHistory?device=pc&platform=web,' + option; java.ajax(hurl); } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1'); if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("bili-sign"))) { var signdate = sign(); cache.put("bili-sign", signdate); } var list=JSON.parse(result).data.images; var result=''; if (Get('s') < 1) { for(i in list){ var url1 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,{"body":{"urls":"[\\"' + list[i].path + '@.jpg\\"]"},"headers":"","method": "POST"}'; var json = java.ajax(url1); cookie.removeCookie(Get('url')); cookie.setCookie(Get('url'), `${ck}`); var list1 = JSON.parse(json); result +='\n'; } } else { var purl = 'https://www.biliplus.com/manga/?act=read&mangaid=' + ComicId + '&epid=' + Epid; var html = java.ajax(purl); if (html.includes('comic-single')) { var plist = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('.comic-single'); for(i in plist){ result +='\n'; } } else { java.toast('【章节提示】\nㅤ\n' + chapter.title + '\n\n♣️BiliPlus解析未成功，重新调用B站解析♣️\n'); for(i in list){ var url1 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,{"body":{"urls":"[\\"' + list[i].path + '@.jpg\\"]"},"headers":"","method": "POST"}'; var json = java.ajax(url1); cookie.removeCookie(Get('url')); cookie.setCookie(Get('url'), `${ck}`); var list1 = JSON.parse(json); result +='\n'; } } } } else { if (baseUrl.includes('/json/')) { '
'; } else { '
'; } }
ruleContent.payAction:
var payurl = Get('url') + '/mc' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16('ComicId' + book.bookUrl)) + '/' + String(baseUrl).replace(/.*ep_id\"\:(\d+)\}.*/, '$1');
payurl;
ruleContent.title:
<js>
if (Get('s') > 0) {
    var ComicId = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('ComicId' + book.bookUrl));
    var Epid = String(baseUrl).replace(/.*ep_id\"\:(\d+)\}.*/, '$1');
    var purl = 'https://www.biliplus.com/manga/?act=read&mangaid=' + ComicId + '&epid=' + Epid;
    var html = java.ajax(purl);
    if (/〔/.test(chapter.title)) {
        var title = chapter.title.match(/(.*)(〔.*)/);
        var Rtitle = title[1] + (html.includes('comic-single') ? '📡' : '') + title[2];
    } else {
        var Rtitle = chapter.title + (html.includes('comic-single') ? '📡' : '');
    }
    String(Rtitle).replace(/[📡]+/g, '📡');
}
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1');
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("bili-sign"))) {
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("bili-sign", signdate);
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes("GetAutoBuyComics") || baseUrl.includes("ListHistory") || baseUrl.includes("ListFavorite")) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data;
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].title;
            latest = String(list[i].latest_ep_short_title).replace(/^([一二两三四五六七八九十零百千万0-9.-]+)[话話章回期]?/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\.\d)$/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\-)/, '第$1话-');
            intro =  '\nㅤ\n⏰时间：' + (list[i].read_time || list[i].latest_read_time
) + '\n📖观看至：' + String(list[i].last_ep_short_title).replace(/^([一二两三四五六七八九十零百千万0-9.]+)[话話章回期]?/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\.\d)$/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\-)/, '第$1话-');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].vcover,
                'url': Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ComicDetail?device=pc&platform=web,{"body":{"comic_id":' + list[i].comic_id + '},"headers":"","method": "POST"}'
            });
        }
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes("GetRankInfo")) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].title;
            var authors = [];
            var authorElements = list[i].author;
            for (var j in authorElements) {
                authors.push(String(authorElements[j]));
            }
            author = authors.join('/');
            var styles = [];
            var styleElements = list[i].styles;
            for (var j in styleElements) {
                styles.push(String(styleElements[j].name));
            }
            style = styles.join(',');
            kind = '♥ ' + Num(list[i].fans) + ',' + (list[i].is_finish > 0 ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + style + ',' + list[i].total + '话,' + (list[i].allow_wait_free ? '等免' : '');
            latest = String(list[i].last_short_title).replace(/^([一二两三四五六七八九十零百千万0-9.]+)[话話章回期]?/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\.\d)$/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\-)/, '第$1话-');
            intro = '';
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].vertical_cover,
                'url': Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ComicDetail?device=pc&platform=web,{"body":{"comic_id":' + list[i].comic_id + '},"headers":"","method": "POST"}'
            });
        }
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes("ClassPage")) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data;
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].title;
            var authors = [];
            var authorElements = list[i].author;
            for (var j in authorElements) {
                authors.push(String(authorElements[j]));
            }
            author = authors.join('/');
            var styles = [];
            var styleElements = list[i].styles;
            for (j in styleElements) {
                styles.push(String(styleElements[j]));
            }
            style = styles.join(',');
            var v2s = [];
            var v2Elements = list[i].bottom_info_v2;
            for (j in v2Elements) {
                if (!String(style).includes(String(v2Elements[j])) && !String(v2Elements[j]).includes('话')) {
                    v2s.push(String(v2Elements[j]));
                }
            }
            v2 = v2s.join(',');
            tag = list[i].rd_tag;
            tag = (!String(style).includes(tag) && !String(v2).includes(tag)) ? tag : '';
            kind = (list[i].is_finish > 0 ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + style + ',' + v2 + ',' + tag + ',' + list[i].total + '话,' + (list[i].is_free > 0 ? '' : '免费') + (list[i].allow_wait_free ? '等免' : '');
            latest = String(list[i].last_short_title).replace(/^([一二两三四五六七八九十零百千万0-9.]+)[话話章回期]?/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\.\d)$/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\-)/, '第$1话-');
            intro = list[i].evaluate;
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].vertical_cover,
                'url': Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ComicDetail?device=pc&platform=web,{"body":{"comic_id":' + list[i].season_id + '},"headers":"","method": "POST"}'
            });
        }
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes("GetRankInfo")) {
        Data();
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes("GetAutoBuyComics") || baseUrl.includes("ListHistory") || baseUrl.includes("ListFavorite") || baseUrl.includes("ClassPage")) {
        var next = '';
        if (!list[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var id = JSON.parse(result).data.id;
    var list = JSON.parse(result).data.ep_list;
    var $1 = element => String(java.getElements(element).attr('content'));
    var date = list[0].pub_time;
    for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        Title = String(list[i].short_title).replace(/^([一二两三四五六七八九十零百千万0-9.]+)[话話章回期]?/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\.\d)$/, '第$1话').replace(/^(\d+\-)/, '第$1话-');
        Title1 = String(list[i].title).replace(/.*?[一二两三四五六七八九十零百千万0-9.]+[话話章回期].*/, '');
        title1 = String((list[i].title && String(list[i].title).replace(/.*?[一二两三四五六七八九十零百千万0-9.]+[话話章回期].*/, '') == '' && Title1 == '') ? '' : Title);
        short_title = list[i].short_title == list[i].short_title ? String(list[i].short_title) : '';
        title2 = String(' ' + String(list[i].title).replace(title1, '').replace(short_title, '')).replace(/^\s$/, '');
        title = String(title1 + title2 + ' ('  + list[i].image_count + 'p)' + (list[i].allow_wait_free ? '[等免]' : ''));
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, '-').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ');
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? (title + '〔' + date + '〕') : title,
            'link': Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/GetImageIndex?device=pc&platform=web,{"body":{"ep_id":' + list[i].id + '},"headers":"","method": "POST"}',
            'time': list[i].pub_time,
            'vip': list[i].is_locked,
            'pay': list[i].is_locked ? false : true
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/Search?device=pc&platform=web,{"body":{"key_word":"' + e + '","page_num":{{page}},"page_size":9},"headers":"","method": "POST"}';
}(key));
</js>
